title: Chicken, olive and red pepper pasta salad
ingredients: ['120g pasta shells', '140g chopped, cooked chicken meat', '3 spring onions, chopped into 2.5cm pieces', '1 red pepper, chopped', '140g sliced black olives', '1 cucumber, peeled and chopped', '150ml Italian-style salad dressing', '4 tablespoons sunflower seeds (optional)']
